places_with_reviews.name: Sri Sri 108 Junglee Baba Bholenath Temple
places_with_reviews.address: bangdubi, Bagdogra, P77P+3QC, Dalkajhar Forest, West Bengal 734013, India

reviews.text: Nestled within a verdant jungle, Junglee Baba Temple exudes tranquility. Its secluded location, reveals a mystical retreat. The modest yet spiritually rich structure harmoniously integrates with the lush surroundings. Devotees seek solace in this unique haven, fostering a profound connection with both nature and divinity.
Jungle baba mandir have situated near bagdogra in Siliguri.It palace is very nice.

Shiva temple. Serene amidst nature! Peace and divine! Very near from Bagdogra Bihar More. From Siliguri towards Hatighisa-Naxalbari, take 2nd right turn after landing from Bagdogra flyover. Forest area, buy ticket at entry gate, Rs 20 per head, extra for vehicle, no stay after 4 pm. Can offer Puja anyday, crowd during sacred occasions, especially Shivaratri. Maintain peace.

If you are an Ardent follower of Lord Shiva, this place is for you ...

The road leading towards the temple is magnificent. You will enjoy the tranquil atmosphere and the lush green forest of the surroundings.

Do visit it once, you will surely love the place.

A small old temple, in the forest is maintained by the Forest Dept and some army men. We met a highly qualified young man from the IT was doing 'sewa' by sweeping the premises. It is quite near the town and airport. A serene place to visit if you have a little extra time before your train or flight. We walked a little bit in the jungle but our adivasi driver warned us about wild elephants and we had to change our minds.

places_with_reviews.name: Ayappa Temple
places_with_reviews.address: Loknath Nagar Rd, behind Ayappa Temple, Bagdogra, West Bengal 734014, India

reviews.text:
This is famous landmark of Bagdogra...
This temple is situated right beside AH2...
The temple is well maintained and clean...
Inside there is a statue of Lord Ayappa...
Every evening puja is done and decorated with many diyas...
This temple is maintained by the army people staying in an around Bagdogra...
This is very popular temple in bagdongra
Small temple but look good 😊
Peaceful small temple to pray at.

One and only oldest Murugan temple in Bagdogra .....it's very popular for all defence personnel all hailing from Southern India and posted here in in and around Bagdogra...people come from very far flung areas...nice environment
